DOC.brief_title: Developing Intervention Prevent Visceral Adipose Tissue Accumulation
DOC.criteria: Resident Beverly Morgan Park neighborhood Chicago contiguous neighborhood Female African American Caucasian Age 42 year old Intact uterus , least one functioning ovary , least one menstrual period last 12 month prior screen . Sufficient motivation level make lifestyle change , determine WISHFIT staff . Hysterectomy Physical activity > 90 min per week Metabolic condition use medication affect weight visceral adipose tissue ( diabetes , acquire immune deficiency syndrome , weight > 300 lb ) Presence history major psychiatric comorbidity ( i.e . dementia , schizophrenia , bipolar disorder , alcohol/drug addiction ) last 6 month History inpatient mental health treatment Currently prescribe antipsychotic medication History hallucination bizarre thought Current pregnancy Has tell physician unsafe engage physical activity An illness expect limit functional status life expectancy , include : heart failure , recent heart attack , liver cirrhosis , kidney failure , oncologic condition , history heart surgery , angioplasty artery stenting .
